mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWD, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_SOCIAL_NUM, INDATE, USER_ADDRESS, USER_ZIPCODE FROM USERS where USER_ID = #{ user_id }

SELECT c.com_name com_name, RE.resume_rno resume_rno, p.posting_title posting_title, p.posting_career posting_career, ar.applicant_recode_result applicant_recode_result, ar.applicant_recode_id applicat_recode_id, to_char(posting_startdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') posting_startdate, TO_CHAR(posting_startdate + INTERVAL '4' DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS posting_lastdate FROM users u JOIN RESUME RE ON u.user_id = re.user_id JOIN applicant_recode ar ON re.resume_rno = ar.resume_rno JOIN posting p ON ar.posting_pno = p.posting_pno JOIN company c ON p.com_id = c.com_id WHERE u.user_id = #{ user_id }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users u JOIN RESUME RE ON u.user_id = re.user_id JOIN applicant_recode ar ON re.resume_rno = ar.resume_rno JOIN posting p ON ar.posting_pno = p.posting_pno JOIN company c ON p.com_id = c.com_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT ps.posting_pno, COUNT(*) AS matching_stack_count, p.posting_title, p.posting_hope_department, TO_CHAR(posting_startdate + INTERVAL '4' DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS posting_startdate, c.com_name, ub.ub_ubno, ub.ub_boolean FROM posting_stack ps JOIN user_stack us ON ps.posting_stack = us.user_stack_name JOIN posting p ON ps.posting_pno = p.posting_pno JOIN company c ON p.com_id = c.com_id LEFT JOIN user_bookmark ub ON p.posting_pno = ub.posting_pno AND ub.user_id = #{user_id} WHERE us.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY ps.posting_pno, p.posting_title, c.com_name, p.posting_hope_department, p.posting_startdate, ub.ub_ubno, ub.ub_boolean ORDER BY matching_stack_count DESC

SELECT USER_ID, UB_BOOLEAN, COM_NAME, POSTING_TITLE, POSTING_CAREER, POSTING_STARTDATE FROM USER_BOOKMARK UB JOIN POSTING P ON UB.POSTING_PNO = P.POSTING_PNO JOIN COMPANY C ON P.COM_ID = C.COM_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND UB_BOOLEAN = 1

SELECT USER_ID, UB_BOOLEAN, COM_NAME, POSTING_TITLE, POSTING_CAREER, POSTING_STARTDATE FROM USER_BOOKMARK UB JOIN POSTING P ON UB.POSTING_PNO = P.POSTING_PNO JOIN COMPANY C ON P.COM_ID = C.COM_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND UB_BOOLEAN = 1
